view

Class NewMajorView

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Scene
      • view.View
        • view.NewMajorView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Subject, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class NewMajorView
extends View
    View that creates a Scene that a Student accesses to enter a major for the What-If Analysis.
    Author:
    Tom Biscardi
